{/* Short Bio */}

About Me

I am a Full Stack Developer with expertise in Android and Web Development. I possess strong problem-solving skills and have demonstrated leadership qualities. Currently, I am also AWS certified.

{/* AWS Certification */}

AWS Certification

I am AWS certified, demonstrating my proficiency in cloud computing and AWS services.

); } export default About;
